vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Meunit(?) of the Canaanites, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.41
Group of me.u.ni (מְעוּנִים "Meunite" H4586)
§ Ammonite = see Ammon "tribal"
descendants of Ammon and inhabitants of Ammon
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞捫人 这个形容詞, 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 見 亞捫[5983] "部落之人"
亞捫的後裔和居住在亞捫的居民
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚扪人 这个形容词, 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 见 亚扪[5983] "部落之人"
亚扪的后裔和居住在亚扪的居民

Another name of am.mon (עַמּוֹן "Ammon" H5983)
